channel.title: Boomscape returns gamble stake pk pvm much more
channel.description:
[size=36pt]boomscape number 1 rsps[center][/center]
website http://boomscape.co.uk/
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661334/2a4f8c1b7f4dd1f9223b8f1ad63a0cc5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661344/3b03fb8ade247d4e51c5c1d1b9aea935.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661345/414720764d3c5b28b7a72443c04395cb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661347/a5e152b314deef0948a1bc9433d92d13.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661348/c012d951747ac875853eaef34f8497d1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661350/d8ebc346588a1eb9afd9ef05aec884b3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661351/e31651ce39ee499ddb3336be60d43a28.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661353/fb05efca5896d91d7c207dd225dcd8ab.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661355/0e2ad324696170cfcc86e9dd70af3c7d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661356/6a4ada4cfa820fa9af165a77b3e9d8f4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661357/9bcf0481833136532b7ccfd7de43c93d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661358/63c99dbe07e31af0aa493a4125cf31f3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4661359/b6a58605bcfae819263ef9fe6721b868.png[/img]
-Eco Based -Grand Exchange -Vote Store -Loyalty STore -Lottery -Full Clan System (Create clans, logos, ect) -718+ -Custom Npcs and items -Drygores -100+pets -Fight caves -Fight Kiln (all waves) -Clan wars -Soul wars -Castle Wars -Pest control -barrows -Nex (all phases) -GWD -Full QBD -Ticket System -Friendly Staff -Clan war events -Fully customizeable clan features -Dag kings -Donator Island -Squeel -Full dungeoning (Group and solo) 24/7 dedicated server hosting - All boss pets obtainable (see here). - Proper construction as a work in progress (still alot of content inside of POH's left to complete) - Yanille home - Experience modes including Insane mode (x5 RS) - Ironman & Ultimate Ironman mode - Highscores & Ironman highscores - Vote4Rewards - Grand exchange - Clan chats - Trivia system - Soul Wars - Pest Control - Shooting stars - Lootshare - Sheathing (not for everything, but most of the commonly used gear can be sheathed) - Tetsu, Death lotus and Sea singer armours available in the prestige 5 shop - 90%~ Farming - Malevolent, Merciless and Vengeful kiteshields - Custom dragon dungeon with Sirenic armour drops - Slayer, with co-op and boss slayer - Animated vorago with a difficult combat script, also drops Seismic wand, singularity, full Tectonic and a baby Vorago pet - Neatly organised teleports & links in the task tab - Master capes with particles that require 104M XP in respective skill (big thanks to @particles from rune-server for his release) - Ascension crossbow obtainable by attaching 6 different signets and a dragon crossbow, all dropped by different bosses - Dual wielding including drygores, ascensions, seismic, virtus & dragon - 5-tier prestige system - Glacors with Glacytes - Full obsidian (level 80 tri-brid armour which degrades after 10 hours - Near 100% God Wars Dungeon, with requirements, items making NPCs passive towards you, frozen key pieces etc... - All base 718 content, such as fight kiln & fight cave, Queen Black Dragon, etc... - Level tokens everytime you gain a level that you can use to purchase equipment to help you gain xp boost items or some gear - Nearly every familiar summonable and creatable - Ability to create a Scarlet spirit shield by combining all four spirit shields. - Leather crafting - Full jewelry crafting and enchanting

item.title: Boomscape returns gamble stake pk pvm much more
item.dc:creator: @snortmyice snortmyice
item.description:
@snortmyice wrote:

[size=36pt]boomscape number 1 rsps[center][/center]

website
http://boomscape.co.uk/

-Eco Based
-Grand Exchange
-Vote Store
-Loyalty STore
-Lottery
-Full Clan System (Create clans, logos, ect)
-718+
-Custom Npcs and items
-Drygores
-100+pets
-Fight caves
-Fight Kiln (all waves)
-Clan wars
-Soul wars
-Castle Wars
-Pest control
-barrows
-Nex (all phases)
-GWD
-Full QBD
-Ticket System
-Friendly Staff
-Clan war events
-Fully customizeable clan features
-Dag kings
-Donator Island
-Squeel
-Full dungeoning (Group and solo)
24/7 dedicated server hosting

  • All boss pets obtainable (see here).
  • Proper construction as a work in progress (still alot of content inside of POH’s left to complete)
  • Yanille home
  • Experience modes including Insane mode (x5 RS)
  • Ironman & Ultimate Ironman mode
  • Highscores & Ironman highscores
  • Vote4Rewards
  • Grand exchange
  • Clan chats
  • Trivia system
  • Soul Wars
  • Pest Control
  • Shooting stars
  • Lootshare
  • Sheathing (not for everything, but most of the commonly used gear can be sheathed)
  • Tetsu, Death lotus and Sea singer armours available in the prestige 5 shop
  • 90%~ Farming
  • Malevolent, Merciless and Vengeful kiteshields
  • Custom dragon dungeon with Sirenic armour drops
  • Slayer, with co-op and boss slayer
  • Animated vorago with a difficult combat script, also drops Seismic wand, singularity, full Tectonic and a baby Vorago pet
  • Neatly organised teleports & links in the task tab
  • Master capes with particles that require 104M XP in respective skill (big thanks to @particles from rune-server for his release)
  • Ascension crossbow obtainable by attaching 6 different signets and a dragon crossbow, all dropped by different bosses
  • Dual wielding including drygores, ascensions, seismic, virtus & dragon
  • 5-tier prestige system
  • Glacors with Glacytes
  • Full obsidian (level 80 tri-brid armour which degrades after 10 hours
  • Near 100% God Wars Dungeon, with requirements, items making NPCs passive towards you, frozen key pieces etc…
  • All base 718 content, such as fight kiln & fight cave, Queen Black Dragon, etc…
  • Level tokens everytime you gain a level that you can use to purchase equipment to help you gain xp boost items or some gear
  • Nearly every familiar summonable and creatable
  • Ability to create a Scarlet spirit shield by combining all four spirit shields.
  • Leather crafting
  • Full jewelry crafting and enchanting
